allFeatures.name: Expertise
allFeatures.description: Choose two of your skill proficiencies; your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of them.

allFeatures.name: Sneak Attack
allFeatures.description: You know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction.

allFeatures.name: Thieves' Cant
allFeatures.description: During your rogue training you learned thieves' cant, a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code.
